jsdoc.content:
/**
 * Direct Integration Test Suite
 *
 * Tests the system after submodule removal and MCP simplification.
 * Validates that all components work with direct integration.
 */

/**
 * WASM Memory Optimizer
 *
 * Advanced memory management and allocation optimization for WASM modules
 * with progressive loading, memory pooling, and garbage collection strategies.
 */

/**
 * Progressive WASM Module Loader
 * Implements on-demand, eager, and progressive loading strategies
 * for optimal performance and memory usage
 */

/**
 * Neural Network CLI for ruv-swarm
 * Provides neural training, status, and pattern analysis using WASM
 */

/**
 * Neural Network Manager
 * Manages per-agent neural networks with WASM integration
 */

/**
   * Create a neural network from a production preset
   * @param {string} agentId - Agent identifier
   * @param {string} category - Preset category (nlp, vision, timeseries, graph)
   * @param {string} presetName - Name of the preset
   * @param {object} customConfig - Optional custom configuration overrides
   */

/**
   * Create a neural network from complete preset (27+ models)
   * @param {string} agentId - Agent identifier
   * @param {string} modelType - Model type (transformer, cnn, lstm, etc.)
   * @param {string} presetName - Name of the preset
   * @param {object} customConfig - Optional custom configuration overrides
   */

/**
   * Create a neural network from a recommended preset based on use case
   * @param {string} agentId - Agent identifier
   * @param {string} useCase - Use case description
   * @param {object} customConfig - Optional custom configuration overrides
   */

/**
   * Get all available presets for a category
   * @param {string} category - Preset category
   */

/**
   * Search presets by use case or description
   * @param {string} searchTerm - Search term
   */

/**
   * Get performance information for a preset
   * @param {string} category - Preset category
   * @param {string} presetName - Preset name
   */

/**
   * Get detailed information about agent's preset (if created from preset)
   * @param {string} agentId - Agent identifier
   */

/**
   * Update existing agent with preset configuration
   * @param {string} agentId - Agent identifier
   * @param {string} category - Preset category
   * @param {string} presetName - Preset name
   * @param {object} customConfig - Optional custom configuration overrides
   */

/**
   * Enable knowledge sharing between agents
   * @param {Array} agentIds - List of agent IDs
   * @param {Object} session - Collaborative session object
   */

/**
   * Extract knowledge from a neural network agent
   * @param {string} agentId - Agent identifier
   */

/**
   * Extract important weights from a neural network
   * @param {Object} network - Neural network instance
   */

/**
   * Calculate importance threshold for weight selection
   * @param {Array} importance - Array of importance scores
   */

/**
   * Identify agent specializations based on performance patterns
   * @param {string} agentId - Agent identifier
   */

/**
   * Infer domain from training patterns
   * @param {Object} adaptation - Adaptation record
   */

/**
   * Create knowledge sharing matrix between agents
   * @param {Array} agentIds - List of agent IDs
   */

/**
   * Calculate similarity between two agents
   * @param {string} agentA - First agent ID
   * @param {string} agentB - Second agent ID
   */

/**
   * Calculate structural similarity between agents
   * @param {Object} knowledgeA - Knowledge from agent A
   * @param {Object} knowledgeB - Knowledge from agent B
   */

/**
   * Calculate performance similarity between agents
   * @param {Object} knowledgeA - Knowledge from agent A
   * @param {Object} knowledgeB - Knowledge from agent B
   */

/**
   * Calculate specialization similarity between agents
   * @param {Object} knowledgeA - Knowledge from agent A
   * @param {Object} knowledgeB - Knowledge from agent B
   */

/**
   * Start knowledge distillation learning
   * @param {Object} session - Collaborative session
   */

/**
   * Identify teacher agents based on performance
   * @param {Array} agentIds - List of agent IDs
   */

/**
   * Perform knowledge distillation between teacher and student
   * @param {string} teacherAgentId - Teacher agent ID
   * @param {string} studentAgentId - Student agent ID
   * @param {Object} session - Collaborative session
   */

/**
   * Apply knowledge distillation to student network
   * @param {Object} student - Student network
   * @param {Object} teacherKnowledge - Teacher's knowledge
   * @param {Object} options - Distillation options
   */

/**
   * Start neural coordination protocol
   * @param {Object} session - Collaborative session
   */

/**
   * Update coordination matrix based on agent interactions
   * @param {Object} session - Collaborative session
   */

/**
   * Calculate interaction strength between two agents
   * @param {string} agentA - First agent ID
   * @param {string} agentB - Second agent ID
   */

/**
   * Apply coordination results to agents
   * @param {Object} session - Collaborative session
   */

/**
   * Apply weight adjustments to a neural network
   * @param {Object} agent - Neural network agent
   * @param {Object} adjustments - Weight adjustments
   */

/**
   * Record agent interaction for coordination tracking
   * @param {string} agentA - First agent ID
   * @param {string} agentB - Second agent ID
   * @param {number} strength - Interaction strength (0-1)
   * @param {string} type - Interaction type
   */

/**
   * Get preset recommendations based on requirements
   * @param {string} useCase - Use case description
   * @param {Object} requirements - Performance and other requirements
   */

/**
   * Get adaptation recommendations for an agent
   * @param {string} agentId - Agent identifier
   */

/**
 * Neural Coordination Protocol
 * Enables sophisticated coordination between neural network agents
 */

/**
   * Register agent with coordination protocol
   * @param {string} agentId - Agent identifier
   * @param {Object} agent - Agent instance
   */

/**
   * Analyze agent capabilities for coordination
   * @param {Object} agent - Agent instance
   */

/**
   * Initialize coordination session
   * @param {Object} session - Session configuration
   */

/**
   * Select optimal coordination strategy for session
   * @param {Object} session - Session configuration
   */

/**
   * Calculate scalability score for agent count
   * @param {number} agentCount - Number of agents
   * @param {number} strategyScalability - Strategy scalability factor
   */

/**
   * Calculate session trust level
   * @param {Object} session - Session configuration
   */

/**
   * Estimate task complexity for session
   * @param {Object} session - Session configuration
   */

/**
   * Check if session has heterogeneous agents
   * @param {Object} session - Session configuration
   */

/**
   * Select consensus protocol for strategy
   * @param {Object} session - Session configuration
   * @param {Object} strategy - Coordination strategy
   */

/**
   * Build communication graph for session
   * @param {Array} agentIds - Agent identifiers
   * @param {Object} strategy - Coordination strategy
   */

/**
   * Build star topology (one central node connected to all others)
   * @param {Map} graph - Communication graph
   * @param {Array} agentIds - Agent identifiers
   */

/**
   * Build mesh topology (all nodes connected to all others)
   * @param {Map} graph - Communication graph
   * @param {Array} agentIds - Agent identifiers
   */

/**
   * Build ring topology (each node connected to neighbors in a ring)
   * @param {Map} graph - Communication graph
   * @param {Array} agentIds - Agent identifiers
   */

/**
   * Build neighborhood topology (each node connected to nearby nodes)
   * @param {Map} graph - Communication graph
   * @param {Array} agentIds - Agent identifiers
   * @param {number} radius - Neighborhood radius
   */

/**
   * Initialize communication channels for session
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Calculate communication latency between agents
   * @param {string} agentA - First agent ID
   * @param {string} agentB - Second agent ID
   */

/**
   * Calculate communication bandwidth between agents
   * @param {string} agentA - First agent ID
   * @param {string} agentB - Second agent ID
   */

/**
   * Calculate communication reliability between agents
   * @param {string} agentA - First agent ID
   * @param {string} agentB - Second agent ID
   */

/**
   * Coordinate agents in session
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Execute coordination strategy
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Execute hierarchical coordination
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Execute peer-to-peer coordination
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Execute swarm coordination
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Execute market-based coordination
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Execute contract net coordination
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Execute blackboard coordination
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Execute multi-agent reinforcement learning coordination
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Execute Byzantine fault tolerant coordination
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   */

/**
   * Execute consensus protocol
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   * @param {Object} coordinationResult - Result from coordination strategy
   */

/**
   * Get coordination results for session
   * @param {string} sessionId - Session identifier
   */

/**
   * Update coordination metrics after coordination
   * @param {Object} session - Coordination session
   * @param {Object} result - Coordination result
   */

/**
 * Neural Agent Module - Integrates ruv-FANN neural network capabilities
 * into agent processing for cognitive diversity and learning
 */

/**
 *  UNIFIED LANCE-SWARM PERSISTENCE LAYER
 *
 * Revolutionary hybrid architecture combining:
 * - LanceDB vector storage for semantic similarity
 * - SQLite relational data for structured queries
 * - Graph relationships for hive-mind coordination
 * - Neural pattern storage for continuous learning
 *
 * This replaces both the Claude Zen memory plugin AND ruv-swarm persistence
 * with a single, ultra-high-performance unified backend.
 */
/** @type {import('better-sqlite3').Database} */

/**
 * High-Availability SQLite Persistence Layer with Connection Pooling
 *
 * This is the production-ready version of the persistence layer that addresses
 * the connection pooling concerns identified in the production readiness assessment.
 *
 * Key improvements:
 * - Connection pooling for high concurrency
 * - Deadlock prevention through queuing
 * - Connection health monitoring
 * - Graceful degradation under load
 * - Proper resource lifecycle management
 */

/**
 * HealthMonitor - Proactive health monitoring system for session persistence
 * Part of comprehensive solution for Issue #137: Swarm session persistence and recovery
 *
 * Features:
 * - Real-time health checking with configurable intervals
 * - Built-in system checks (memory, CPU, event loop, persistence)
 * - Custom health check registration
 * - Threshold-based alerting and escalation
 * - Performance metrics collection
 * - Integration with recovery workflows
 *
 * Version: 1.0.0 - Production Grade
 * Author: Claude Code Assistant (Swarm Implementation)
 * License: MIT
 */

/**
 * HealthMonitor provides comprehensive system health monitoring
 * with configurable checks and automatic alerting
 */

/**
 * Diagnostic utilities for ruv-swarm
 * Helps debug connection issues and performance problems
 */

/**
 * Diagnostic CLI for ruv-swarm
 * Usage: npx ruv-swarm diagnose [options]
 */

/**
 * Comprehensive test suite for WASM integration
 * Tests progressive loading, neural networks, and swarm orchestration
 */

/**
 * WASM Loading Validation Test for ruv-swarm v1.0.6
 * Ensures WASM loads without fallback and validates memory allocation
 */

/**
 * Test Setup Validation Script
 * Ensures all test dependencies and files are properly configured
 */
